personalInfo.clubAffl: The Heritage GC at Westmoor (Westminster, Colorado)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T108 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Led Ponoma High School to the 5A state golf championship in 2008...Named 2009 Mountain West Conference Freshman of the Year at Colorado State...Won the 2009 and 2011 Colorado Golf Association Public Links Championship...Helped lead Colorado State to the 2010 MWC Team title...Won the individual title at the 2012 Ping Cougar Classic in Provo, Utah...Named a first-team member of the 2013 Mountain West Conference all-conference squad.
tourBios.personal: Siblings Zenon and Zarena are both successful athletes...Zenon won the Colorado Golf Association Match Play and Public Links, is a two-time All-American scholar who plays professional golf...Zarena has numerous swimming medals and records and plans to swim for Houston University, beginning in 2016...Later in life he would like to own land and raise cattle and ride horses...Outside golf enjoys country dancing, playing the alto saxophone, snowboarding and riding horses.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T55th in 2013 at the Utah Championship Presented by Utah Sports Commission.
